Package storage

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • storage.Storage
  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    The `Storage` class is responsible for managing the storage and retrieval of tasks in the BloopBot application. It handles saving tasks to a file and loading tasks from a file. This class ensures that tasks are persisted between program runs.
    Version:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    raydenlim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Storage​(java.lang.String directoryPath, java.lang.String fileName, TaskList taskList)
      Constructs a new `Storage` object with the specified directory path, file name, and `TaskList`.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void loadTasks()
      Loads tasks from the task data file and adds them to the `TaskList`.
      void saveTask​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasks)
      Saves the provided list of tasks to the task data file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Storage

        public Storage​(java.lang.String directoryPath,
               java.lang.String fileName,
               TaskList taskList)
        Constructs a new `Storage` object with the specified directory path, file name, and `TaskList`.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - The directory path where the task data file will be stored.
        fileName - The name of the task data file.
        taskList - The `TaskList` containing tasks to be managed by the storage.

    • Method Detail

      • saveTask

        public void saveTask​(java.util.ArrayList<Task> tasks)
        Saves the provided list of tasks to the task data file.
        Parameters:
        tasks - The list of tasks to be saved.

      • loadTasks

        public void loadTasks()
        Loads tasks from the task data file and adds them to the `TaskList`.
